channel.title: Posts on Zubair's Tech Trails
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zubair's Tech Trails

item.title: Why You Should Start Writing
item.description: Why I started writing blog posts because of AI—and why you should too. In a world of synthetic content, your authentic voice has never been more valuable.

item.title: What is Security?
item.description: Every security measure creates new vulnerabilities. Every protection requires surrendering control. Every attempt to hide makes you more visible. Welcome to the contradictory world of cybersecurity, where being secure and feeling secure are often opposite things.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: An introduction to my blog as a Computer Science student specializing in cybersecurity, outlining my goals, content structure, and why I’m sharing my hands-on experiences.
